name: Ethicoin
description: Ethicoin is a gold-backed cryptocurrency, a BEP-20 token built on the Binance Smart Chain (BSC). It represents a decentralized, transparent, and eco-friendly approach to digital finance, backed by real gold reserves. The ticker symbol for Ethicoin is ETHIC+. Learn more at [Ethicoin.org](https://www.ethicoin.org/).
